cfgparam.name: MODE
cfgparam.desc: Controls value of PAR record field 8. "prod" for production, anything else is testing.

cfgparam.name: SRCPASSWD
cfgparam.desc: Do not use. Not needed with proper PKI techiques.

cfgparam.name: RXBATCHID
cfgparam.value: "$$ ID=MARINCRO BID= 'PGP ECS OUTBNR CAFSCRO' ONEBATCH=Y"

cfgparam.name: RECONBATCHID
cfgparam.value: "$$ ID=MCCSAP1O BID= 'PGP IAR OUTBNR GAFS4VX' ONEBATCH=Y"

cfgparam.name: scrubdays
cfgparam.desc: Numbers of days to keep files on disk
